name: EchoSphere
tagline: EchoSphere is a decentralized, peer-to-peer communication platform built using Libp2p.
description: EchoSphere is a decentralized, peer-to-peer communication platform built using Libp2p. It enables people to connect, communicate, and form local communities without the need for internet access. Whether you're in a disaster zone, a rural village, a school campus, or just looking to meet nearby people
